backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing memories, songs, and YouTube links with CRUD-style APIs and auto-incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three lock-screen related features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark palettes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app through main.tsx and providing the root mount node.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling password unlock flow, welcome screen, and full memory-book UI with widgets and header actions.
frontend/src/components/MemoryFullscreen: Modal viewer showing a memory in full detail with text, metadata, image handling, and a video viewer launcher.
frontend/src/components/MemoryList.tsx: Renders a list of memory cards with author, timestamp, text, images, videos, and fullscreen/video viewers.
frontend/src/components/MemorySubmitForm: Form for submitting a new memory with text, author, image/video URLs or file uploads, including validation and previews.
frontend/src/components/MusicBoxWidget.t: Widget for uploading audio files and playing stored songs with file validation and simple audio controls.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: Login gate requiring a username and 4‑digit code, handling validation and unlock attempts.
frontend/src/components/VideoViewer.tsx: Modal video viewer that plays a memory’s video and shows an error alert on load failure.
frontend/src/components/WelcomePage.tsx: Welcome screen with hero image, intro text, and buttons to enter the memory book or lock it.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeLinksDial: Dialog component for submitting and viewing YouTube links with validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemories.ts: Fetches and sorts memories from the backend and provides a mutation to submit new ones.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordGate.ts: Implements a simple username/password gate stored in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting removal of old Tingi search code.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongs.ts: Retrieves and sorts uploaded songs and provides an upload mutation with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWelcomeGate.ts: Tracks whether a welcome screen was dismissed using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeLinks.ts: Fetches YouTube links sorted by timestamp and provides a submission mutation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/audio.ts: Utilities for converting files to Uint8Array and generating audio data URLs with MIME guessing.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into human-readable dates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, and identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom color tokens, typography and animation extensions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including feature descriptions, front-end password gate requirements, visitor media upload behavior, and architectural notes for a memory-sharing website.
